item.title: Rank-yell command
item.dc:creator: @bily123 bily123
item.description:
@bily123 wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:4, topic:356382”]Use this.

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { String yell = command.substring(5); switch (playerRights) { case 1: case 2: yell("[Staff] "+playerName+": "+yell+""); break; case 3: yell("[Owner] "+playerName+": "+yell+""); break; default: yell(""+playerName+": "+yell+""); } }[/quote]
Thanks this worked Case CLOSED

Read full topic

item.title: Rank-yell command
item.dc:creator: @splinter-x splinter-x
item.description:
@splinter-x wrote:

I think he means add a “}” over yell("[Mod]["+playerName+"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

Read full topic

item.title: Rank-yell command
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Use this.

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { String yell = command.substring(5); switch (playerRights) { case 1: case 2: yell("[Staff] "+playerName+": "+yell+""); break; case 3: yell("[Owner] "+playerName+": "+yell+""); break; default: yell(""+playerName+": "+yell+""); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Rank-yell command
item.dc:creator: @bily123 bily123
item.description:
@bily123 wrote:

Does anyone know how to make a yell command that puts your rank next to your name?
I tried it as 3 separate commands but i get 100 errors when I compile.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights = 1) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("[Mod]["+playerName+"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights = 2) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("[Admin]["+playerName+"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights = 3) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("[Owner]["+playerName+"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Read full topic
